items.sentence: We will now report on this year\'s business results.
Tom came into the room without knocking on the door.
Tom carried everything he owned in a small suitcase.
Tom checked his wallet to see how much money he had.
Tom climbed up the ladder to the roof of the garage.
Are you really going to let Tom go there by himself?
Can you tell me how you found out that Tom did that?
Despite language difficulties, we were soon friends.
I think the time is right to introduce this product.
I thought Tom had already been compensated for that.
